title: CONFLICTS OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRE
questions: Do you have any direct or indirect financial ownership or partial ownership in any retail business or other business that sells cigarettes or does business with R.J. Reynolds?
Does any member of your immediate family have any financial interest in any retail business or other business that sells cigarettes or does business with R.J. Reynolds?

Are you involved in any outside interest or activities that create conflicting loyalties, that could cause you to give preference to those personal interests in situations where corporate responsibilities should come first?

If any of the above statements apply, identify the name of the business, the location of the business, your relationship to the business, and whether the business is located within your assignment, division, or region.
return_instructions: RETURN THIS TO YOUR MANAGERBY MARCH 13,1998
